resources.string: A verification code has been sent to your phone.Please check it and enter here. Some times it may take 1 or 2 minutes to arrive .You should wait on that case.
you have to enter your master password before accessing notes

This is a smart professional cloud notebook with various themes and animations.
 >>Unfortunately if you lose your mobile still you can retrieve your old notes from cloud by logging in with the number you created your account before.

 >>No data loss
 Because, all your notes are saved in cloud safely and you can retrieve it from anywhere by your personal phone number that you used before creating your NoteBook ID . In that case you have to verify again yourself that you own that number. 

 >>No one can access your notes
 Because they have to need your personal mobile number and verify to log in your notebook ID . 

 >>All are secured with master password
 Because When you set your profile you have to set a master password that will protect your notes form un authorised access of people
